Text.val: 25.07.2011 SH SCR16621 Changed use of client language
16.07.2011 GB SCR16621 Changed calculation for V.AGREED
12.04.2011 GB SCR16368 Changed value of the parameter PI.MUTTYPE in the B. Charge client
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
20.04.2007 AK SCR12471 Writing commission in the Client language
18.12.2006 AK SCR12013 Use ADML_LTYP_TYPE=27 instead of 5 for LDGR_NO
-- If V.WORKINGDAY <> 10 then close the program without updates

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count (*) from :1/CALD where YEAR (CALD_DATE) = :2 and MONTH (CALD_DATE) = :3 and DAY (CALD_DATE) <= :4

select CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT108_ACC_CURR, CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGS, CLNT201_LANGUAGE, CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN where CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGS > 0 and CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and (CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ = 1 or CLNT611_COMMOVERDRAWINGSFREQ = 3 and month (':2') in (1,4,7,10))
select count(*), max (CDOV_OVERDRAWINGAGREED) from :1/CDOV where CDOV_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CDOV_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CDOV_DATE between ':4' and ':5' and CDOV_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N' :6
